io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.adapters.file

Class FileSourceDataUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.adapters.file.FileSourceDataUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SourceDataUnit

    public class FileSourceDataUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements SourceDataUnit
    A SourceDataUnit implementation based on a file. Contents is first read from the file, then the file extension may be changed, so that processed file are not taken twice, and non-processed files can be corrected.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String FILE_ERROR
      New extension for for non-processed files (failure): ".error"
      static java.lang.String FILE_PROCESSED
      New extension for processed files: ".processed"

        public void afterProcessing(boolean success)

        Description copied from interface: SourceDataUnit

        Specified by:
